details.smdes: Aspiring Mern Stack Developer with proficiency in both Frontend development , Backend Development and also familiar with its associated tools , technologies and best practices.
details.des: I am an Aspiring Software Engineer proficient in Mern Stack Developement, I am Capable of developing scalable applications and landing pages, I have strong understanding of Building Rest-full Api's and integrate other api's as well as Database with Node & Express covering whole backend developement and Frontend by Building Rich interfaces with integrated animations using Framer-motion,Bootstrap/Tailwind/Material-Ui & React, I have a intension to write clean code with best practices and ensure efficiency with it, I am Fresher in field yet experienced in teams and communications,Currently I am open to work and Looking for Job Opportunities.
